Description:
Dry clothes efficiently with this 7.0 cu. ft. Whirlpool electric dryer. Its end-of-cycle periodic tumbling option prevents creases and wrinkles, and its three temperature selections and 14 settings handle a variety of loads and fabrics. This 29-inch Whirlpool electric dryer's wide-opening drop-down door keeps freshly laundered items off the floor and simplifies unloading. 
Safely dry all your garments and linens with 1 of 14 cycles: Includes heavy duty, freshen up, wrinkle shield, air fluff and other drying programs., 
Avoid over-drying by provide the proper heat for different fabric types: 3 temperature settings., 
Save time between loads with an end-of-cycle signal: Know exactly when it's time to change your load with an audible signal., 
Front-loading design: For easy access., 
Drum light: Provides a clear view of the dryer's interior., 
Powder coated interior: For durability.,

Description:
Doing laundry might be an unwelcome chore, but the Insignia NS-TDRE67W1 12-Cycle Electric Dryer makes it easier than ever before. A 6.7 cu. ft. capacity makes doing large loads a breeze, saving you time and letting you move on to doing other things. 12 unique drying cycles, ranging from Delicates to Heavy Duty, get everything from clothing to comforters as clean as can be. A special Wrinkle Care mode reduces wrinkles and various dryness levels let you choose anywhere between high heat or no heat. The dryer is a front load design and features a reversible door, letting you choose whatever option works best for your layout. Plus, picking up the available matching washer means you’ll spend less time doing laundry and more time doing what you want to do. 
6.7 cu. ft. capacity: Gives you the space you need to thoroughly wash blankets, comforters, curtains, coats and more., 
9 sensor and manual drying cycles: 6 sensor cycles — Normal, Heavy Duty, Towels, Casual, Delicates and Sanitize — automatically detect moisture and adjust the dry time. 3 manual cycles — Quick Dry, Air Fluff, and Time Dry (20-, 40-, 60- and 80-Minute) — let you customize the dry time., 
Front load design: Easy-access front load design makes larger loads easier to lift in and out., 
Temperature selection: Select either High, Medium, Low or No Heat for simple temperature adjustment., 
Dryness levels: Choose the dryness level (Damp, Normal, More Dry or Very Dry) that best suits your load, and the dryer automatically detects the load’s moisture and stops when your clothes are finished., 
Wrinkle Care feature: Provides about 90 minutes of intermittent tumbling in unheated air, reducing wrinkles in your clothing., 
Control panel: Select your drying mode at the simple twist of a knob. It also displays indicator lights for cycle selections you have made., 
Reversible door: Choose the direction of the door that best suits your space., 
Electric connection: Just connect the dryer to a 3- or 4-wire outlet (power cord not included)., 
Clean Filter indicator: Reminds you when your filter needs to be cleaned., 
Less than 69 dB: Operates at a noise level of less than 69 dB., 
Leveling feet: 4 adjustable feet keep your dryer level., 
Matching washer: The coordinating NS-TWM35W1 washer gives your laundry area a cohesive look.,

Description:
Samsung’s new 7.5 cu. ft. dryer allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, receive end of cycle alerts, and more, right from your smartphone. Steam Sanitize+ eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria, while Multi-Steam technology relaxes and smooths away wrinkles from everyday wear. 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Scratch-Resistant Tempered Glass Door: Our sleek, new flat-panel door will elevate any laundry space and with scratch-resistant tempered glass, it combines an ultra-premium design with a durable finish, 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake., 
: The Filter Check Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser,³ your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching washer, pedestal, riser and more., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included., 
: ¹Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. Available on Android and iOS devices. Only monitoring enabled on Gas Dryers for safety reasons., 
: ²Based on internal testing and independently verified by Intertek., 
: ³ADA Compliant when using 27" wide riser. (Riser model codes: WE272NV, WE272NW, WE272NC),

Description:
At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building some of the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home. 
Auto Dry: Auto Dry monitors the internal air temperature to determine the ideal drying time, protecting your garments from overdying., 
Powerful Venting & Flexible Installation: Powerful airflow offers long-lasting performance from lint build-up and offers venting solutions up to 120 feet for greater installation flexibility., 
Large Diffuser for Even Drying: A large internal heat diffuser allows for warm air to evenly spread throughout your clothes during the cycle, making this the ideal dryer for large loads and bulky items., 
Extended Tumble: Tumble clothes without heat to prevent creasing and wrinkling with a convenient extended tumble button. This cycle is ideal to help to remove even more pet hair on already-dry items, allowing debris to be caught by your dryer’s lint screen., 
Interior Light: Convenient dryer drum lights provide better visibility to help ensure no small items or socks are left behind, making it easier to load and unload laundry., 
Adjustable Cycle Signal: End of Cycle signal volume is adjustable, ensuring you are alerted to promptly remove your garments before winkles have a chance to form., 
Durable Aluminized Drum: This durable, long-lasting design resists corrosion and optimizes drying performance., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Door can swing from either direction making it easier to access the last sock from the back of the drum., 
Temperature Selection: Offer a range of drying temperatures to adjust to the specific needs of your garments for personalized garment care., 
Up Front Lint Filter: Simplify the task of lint removal with our convenient upfront lint filter, enhancing airflow within the appliance and for your garments., 
Delicates Cycle: This delicate, low heat dryer setting helps protect fabrics and extends the lifetime of even your most delicate items., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,

10 manual and sensor dry cycles: Five manual dry cycles — Heavy Duty, Bulky, Quick Dry, Time Dry and Air Fluff — let you select the exact dry time that you need. Five sensor dry cycles — Normal, Delicates, Casual, Towels and Sanitize — automatically detect when your load is finished.,

Easy to operate: The digital display shows the remaining cycle time, and the cycle selector knob make the dryer easy to select your options. Cycle progress indicators let you know what drying stage you’re in.,

Description:
The 2-way LG EasyLoad door opens hamper style for loading and swings open for unloading for maximum versatility. Quickly move clothes from washer to dryer and dryer to basket—and cross laundry off your list. Easy-to-use electronic controls with LED display and built-in intelligence with AI Sensor Dry take out the guesswork. Activate Smart Pairing in the LG ThinQ app and your LG washer will automatically tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle.¹ 
7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
EasyLoad Door: The dual-opening options of the LG EasyLoad door make loading and unloading the dryer easier than ever. Transferring wet clothes from the washer? Simply press the release button and pull the door down, hamper style to keep that stray sock from hitting the floor. Removing dry items? Swing the door to the side to clear the way for your basket below. Even tight spaces and challenging laundry-room layouts are no match for versatility like this., 
Built-In Intelligence: AI Sensor Dry with Smart Pairing: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. AI Sensor Dry detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes—no more damp clothes, no more overdrying., 
: With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle¹, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
ThinQ Smart Technology: The ThinQ app offers control and convenience to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Control your dryer remotely or use voice commands with Google or Alexa voice assistants. Plus, download additional cycles and access Smart Diagnosis, customer support, and more., 
ThinQ UP: ThinQ UP enabled smart appliances receive continual software updates for new downloadable features and enhancements sent wirelessly to the appliance. Choose which features you want and customize your appliance based on your lifestyle and personal preferences., 
ThinQ Care: Available within the ThinQ app, ThinQ Care sends proactive usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to your smartphone to help keep your LG smart appliances running smoothly., 
Electronic Controls with LED Display: LG’s built-in intelligence and electronic controls with LED display make it easy to get laundry day dialed in. Not only can you easily access all the cycles with a turn of the dial, but you can also quickly modify any cycle using the touch panel for total laundry control., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators let you know when your ducts and filter need cleaning to avoid lint buildup, improve the dryer’s performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20%² less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
Aluminized Alloy Steel Drum: An advanced aluminized alloy coating is added to the steel dryer drum to enhance durability and maintain its luster and attractive finish. Helps keep nicks and chips at bay so your dryer looks like new even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹Both washer and dryer need to be registered in LG ThinQ app and connected to wi-fi to set up Smart Pairing feature., 
: ²https://www.energystar.gov/products/appliances/clothes_dryers,

Description:
Let Maytag tackle your large laundry loads in this 7.0 cu. ft. capacity dryer. Don’t worry about forgetting to take clothes out of the dryer—the automatic Wrinkle Prevent phase keeps clothes tumbling to help stop wrinkles. 
Wrinkle Prevent Phase: Get built-in wrinkle prevention. After the automatic cycle has ended, the Wrinkle Prevent phase keeps the dryer tumbling to help defend against wrinkles., 
Large Capacity: Dry large loads with a spacious 7.0 cu. ft. capacity., 
End of Cycle Signal: Avoid forgotten laundry with the end of cycle signal so finished loads aren't left behind., 
American Pride: We take pride in building strong, reliable appliances for your home. These dryers are proudly assembled by hard-working employees in Marion, Ohio.,

Description:
One push of the Extra Power button on Maytag heavy-duty dryers boosts drying power on any cycle by extending time, heat, and tumbling. Commercial-grade dryer technology ensures it's built to last, while optional smart electric dryer features such as remote start and cycle notifications help you stay in control and efficiently manage laundry from anywhere. 
Extra Power: Extra Power boosts drying power to get thick fabrics drier the first time.¹, 
Wrinkle Prevent Option with Steam: With the Wrinkle Prevent option with Steam, the dryer tumbles your clothes with steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle has ended to keep wrinkles at bay., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Reduce Static Option: The Reduce Static option cuts down on cling with the addition of a fine mist of water as clothes tumble at the end of the cycle., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Built to reduce wrinkles, the Steam Refresh cycle quickly revives clothes without the need for a full wash cycle., 
Hamper Door: Sweep laundry onto the open hamper door to keep it off the floor. The latch-free door drops down, giving you a chute for loading and a sturdy platform for unloading, folding and stacking., 
10-year Limited Parts Warranty: We don’t just tell you a Maytag dryer will get your clothes dry for years: we confidently back our dryers with a 10-year limited parts warranty* on the drive motor and drum., 
Quick Dry Cycle: The Quick Dry cycle dries small loads fast. Clothes will be ready before you know it when paired with the Quick Wash cycle., 
Remote Start: Do laundry anywhere, anytime with your smartphone.² Set cycles with the option to choose from customized favorites, only available in the Maytag app, then start and stop the cycle remotely., 
Cycle Notifications: Finished loads won't be left behind with the Maytag app.² Get end of cycle notification on your smartphone with the option to Assign a Task to family members to keep laundry moving., 
Troubleshoot: Troubleshoot select issues without a service call. The Maytag app sends notifications of appliance error codes to help you diagnose the error and videos of select issues walk you through steps to solve the problem.², 
Assign a Task: Manage laundry from anywhere by assigning tasks to family members like transferring a load to the dryer or folding clean clothes through customized text messages. ², 
Match Washer and Dryer Cycle: Get the best dry for your clothes without the guesswork. With the Maytag app, receive a recommended dry cycle that matches your last wash cycle, then send the cycle to your dryer.², 
Smart Tips: Personalized Smart Tips based on your laundry activity help you best clean your laundry and effectively use your Maytag appliances.², 
Favorites: Create customized cycles and save them in the Maytag app. Instantly access Favorites from the app and send them to your washer or dryer to start the load remotely. ², 
American Pride: We take pride in building strong, reliable appliances for your home. These dryers are proudly assembled by hard-working employees in Marion, Ohio., 
Heavy-duty hinges: Heavy-duty door hinges are built tough for years of reliable opening and closing., 
Wrinkle Control Cycle: The Wrinkle Control cycle uses lower temperatures and defaults to using the Wrinkle Prevent option to help minimize wrinkles., 
Maytag Commercial Technology: Maytag Commercial Technology ensures our dryers are built to last, coming standard with a durable motor and the dryer drum backed by a 10-year limited parts warranty., 
: ¹ Results may vary based on load size and type.,

Description:
Samsung's Large Capacity Electric Dryer is equipped with Steam Sanitize+, which removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi- Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles. With Wi-Fi connectivity, you can remotely start, stop, or delay your dryer from our simple-to-use SmartThings App. Sensor Dry automatically optimizes the time and temperature of the drying cycle to help prevent overdrying while avoiding excess energy use. 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen¹ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end-of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your washing, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.², 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.³ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions.,

Description:
Drying a king-size comforter and bedding in a single load is just the start—this dryer features built-in intelligence that automatically selects the right settings to eliminate the guesswork. It can even talk to your washer to pick a compatible cycle. When there’s no time to wash, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles in just 10 minutes to refresh clothes in between washes. 
9.0 cu. ft. Mega Capacity: When it comes to laundry capacity, big is good, bigger is better, but biggest is best. With 9.0 cu. ft. of mega capacity, now you can fit a king size comforter and full set of bedding in a single load! You'll definitely have more room to dry., 
TurboSteam Technology: You grab your favorite shirt from the closet only to find that the hanger has left indelible imprints on each shoulder. What to do when there's no time to wash? Toss the shirt in the dryer, turn on TurboSteam and your shirt is back in tip-top shape., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
Built-In Intelligence (AI Fabric Sensor / Smart Pairing - Dryer): Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care., 
: Sensor Dry detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes—no more damp clothes, no more overdrying. With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
ThinQ Technology: No matter where you are, use the ThinQ app to start the dryer, extend cycle time to avoid wrinkles and receive an alert when clothes are dry. Go hands-free—select dryer features work with Alexa and Google Assistant. Never run out of dryer sheets again—, 
: Amazon Dash Replenishment Service tracks usage and automatically delivers dryer sheets right to your door., 
FlowSense: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators help let you know when your ducts and filter need cleaning to avoid lint buildup, improve the dryer’s performance for greater efficiency, lower utility bills, and safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance.¹, 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to keep drying your clothes more efficiently without showing wear and tear., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer periodically tumbles the load up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer.: It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹Source: https://www.energystar.gov/products/appliances/clothes_dryers,

Description:
At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building some of the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home. 
Auto Dry: Auto Dry monitors the internal air temperature to determine the ideal drying time, protecting your garments from overdying., 
Powerful Venting & Flexible Installation: Powerful airflow offers long-lasting performance from lint build-up and offers venting solutions up to 120 feet for greater installation flexibility., 
Large Diffuser for Even Drying: A large internal heat diffuser allows for warm air to evenly spread throughout your clothes during the cycle, making this the ideal dryer for large loads and bulky items., 
Delicates Cycle: This delicate, low heat dryer setting helps protect fabrics and extends the lifetime of even your most delicate items., 
Durable Aluminized Drum: This durable, long-lasting design resists corrosion and optimizes drying performance., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Door can swing from either direction making it easier to access the last sock from the back of the drum., 
Temperature Selection: Offer a range of drying temperatures to adjust to the specific needs of your garments for personalized garment care., 
Up Front Lint Filter: Simplify the task of lint removal with our convenient upfront lint filter, enhancing airflow within the appliance and for your garments., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,

Description:
Samsung’s new Smart Dryer has integrated Wi-Fi that allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, and receive end of cycle alerts and more, right from your smartphone. Also, the Steam Sanitize+ cycle eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria while relaxing and smoothing away wrinkles from everyday wear. 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use.³, 
CleanGuard: Have peace of mind with antimicrobial technology that protects high-touch areas of your dryer.⁴, 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.⁵ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions., 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now features audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons., 
Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance., 
: ¹Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. The Samsung SmartThings App supports Android OS 4.0 (ICS) or later which is optimized for Samsung smartphones (Galaxy S and Galaxy Note series)., 
: ¹This app also supports iOS 7 or later for iPhone models. SmartThings App available in App Store and Play Store. Only monitoring enabled on Gas Dryers for safety reasons.,

7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more.,

ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
Closet Depth: LG closet-depth washers and dryers are worth showing off, but when space dictates otherwise it’s good to know they’ll easily fit in a closet with plenty of room to close the closet door. Install the pair side-by-side, or get a stacking kit and install the dryer over the washer.,

Description:
Quickly move laundry from washer to dryer and dryer to basket with the 2-way LG EasyLoad door. It opens hamper style for loading and swings open for unloading for maximum versatility. Optimize drying performance using the LCD dial and built-in intelligence with AI Sensor Dry to take out the guesswork. Even easier—activate Smart Pairing in the LG ThinQ app and your LG washer will automatically tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle. 
7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
EasyLoad Door: The dual-opening options of the LG EasyLoad door make loading and unloading the dryer easier than ever. Transferring wet clothes from the washer? Simply press the release button and pull the door down, hamper style to keep that stray sock from hitting the floor. Removing dry items? Swing the door to the side to clear the way for your basket below. Even tight spaces and challenging laundry-room layouts are no match for versatility like this., 
Built-In Intelligence: AI Sensor Dry with Smart Pairing: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. AI Sensor Dry detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes—no more damp clothes, no more overdrying., 
: With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle¹, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
ThinQ Smart Technology: The ThinQ app offers control and convenience to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Control your dryer remotely or use voice commands with Google or Alexa voice assistants. Plus, download additional cycles and access Smart Diagnosis, customer support, and more., 
ThinQ UP: ThinQ UP enabled smart appliances receive continual software updates for new downloadable features and enhancements sent wirelessly to the appliance. Choose which features you want and customize your appliance based on your lifestyle and personal preferences., 
ThinQ Care: Available within the ThinQ app, ThinQ Care sends proactive usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to your smartphone to help keep your LG smart appliances running smoothly., 
TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again. TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
Digital Dial Control with LCD Display: LG’s built-in intelligence and intuitive LCD dial make it easy to get laundry day dialed in. Streamlined controls give you more of what you need with each turn of the dial, from helpful prompts to status updates to remaining cycle time. Easily access more than 20 cycles and quickly modify any cycle using the touch panel for total laundry control., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators let you know when your ducts and filter need cleaning to avoid lint buildup, improve the dryer’s performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to keep drying your clothes more efficiently without showing wear and tear., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹Both washer and dryer need to be registered in LG ThinQ app and connected to Wi-Fi to set up Smart Pairing feature.,

Description:
This front load dryer uses sensor drying technology to help prevent overdrying by stopping the load at just the right time. Easily keep loads on your schedule with the Wrinkle Shield Option which helps keep wrinkles from setting with continued tumbling after the cycle ends or use Timed Dry for extra drying time when you need it. 
Moisture Sensing: Two sensors increase your dryer’s ability to measure moisture and temperature, helping prevent overdrying by automatically stopping the cycle when the load is dry., 
Wrinkle Shield Option: After the cycle ends, help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics with the Wrinkle Shield Option. It keeps clothes tumbling for up to 2.5 hours after the cycle ends or until you open the door., 
Timed Dry: Take control of your time and the dryness level of your load. Set the control for 15, 30, 60 or 90 minutes when a damp load needs a little extra dry time or when using a drying rack., 
Air Only Cycle: Fluff and refresh loads or air out delicates with a cycle that tumbles your items with no heat., 
7.0 Cu. Ft. Capacity: With a 7.0 Cu. Ft. Capacity dryer drum, there’s plenty of room to easily handle the large loads you washed in the matching top load washer., 
Quick Dry Cycle: Dry a small load quickly or customize settings to add more time. Plus, you can choose to remember your settings for your next load of laundry., 
Interior Light: See every item in the dryer with the Interior Light., 
End of Cycle Signal: Know when your cycle is finished with an end of cycle buzzer., 
Wrinkle Control Cycle: The Wrinkle Control Cycle helps to minimize wrinkles by using lower temperatures during the cycle, then defaulting to using the Wrinkle Shield Option for continued tumbling after the cycle ends., 
An American Company: Whirlpool Corporation started in 1911 as a small company in Benton Harbor, Michigan.,

Description:
Samsung's Large Capacity Electric Dryer is equipped with Steam Sanitize+, which removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles. With Wi-Fi connectivity, you can remotely monitor your dryer from our simple-to-use SmartThings App. Sensor Dry automatically optimizes the time and temperature of the drying cycle to help prevent overdrying while avoiding excess energy use. 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen¹ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles.,

Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Premium material and design that is more durable and scratch resistant., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now feature audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons., 
Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day.,

: It automatically notifies you when it is time for a cleaning and prompts you to check for obstructions, so you can always maintain optimum drying performance.,

Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now features audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons., 
Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance.,

Description:
Electric Dryer 
Wrinkle Shield Option: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics with the Wrinkle Shield option. It keeps clothes tumbling for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the door., 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags., 
Energy star Certified: Energy Star certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Sanitize Cycle: The Sanitize Cycle provides care for your clothes in the dryer while eliminating 99.9% of common household bacteria. (Bacteria tested were K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus.), 
Advanced Moisture Sensing: Three sensors offer added protection against overdrying by tracking both moisture and temperature to adapt drying times and end the cycle at just the right time., 
EcoBoost Option: Use less energy while getting great drying performance with the EcoBoost option. This option saves energy by using less heat and an extended cycle time., 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Closet-Depth Fit: Get a space-saving design with Closet-Depth Fit that allows for more flexible installation in your laundry space., 
Laundry Pedestal Compatible: Raise your dryer for easier loading and unloading. Optional Laundry Pedestals also provide space-saving storage for detergent, dryer sheets and other supplies.,

Description:
Make laundry day chores easy with this LG electric dryer. Its large 7.3 cu. ft. capacity ensures it handles family-size loads, and the modern black steel finish matches your existing washer. The EasyLoad door on this LG electric dryer offers dual opening options to simplify the loading and unloading process. 
7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
EasyLoad Door: The dual-opening options of the LG EasyLoad door make loading and unloading the dryer easier than ever. Transferring wet clothes from the washer? Simply press the release button and pull the door down, hamper style to keep that stray sock from hitting the floor., 
: Removing dry items? Swing the door to the side to clear the way for your basket below. Even tight spaces and challenging laundry-room layouts are no match for versatility like this., 
ThinQ Technology with ThinQ Care: Wherever you are, use ThinQ to start the dryer, extend cycle time to avoid wrinkles and receive alerts when clothes are dry. Go hands-free—select dryer features work with Alexa and Google Assistant. Never run out of dryer sheets again—, 
: Amazon Dash Replenishment Service tracks usage and automatically delivers dryer sheets right to your door. ThinQ Care offers preventative maintenance tips, alerts and expedited repairs, for enhanced satisfaction plus improved product performance., 
Smart Pairing: With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to keep drying your clothes more efficiently without showing wear and tear., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right- to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry; select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer periodically tumbles the load up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: *Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹https://www.energystar.gov/products/appliances/clothes_dryers,

Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Ultra Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our AI Optimal Dry, which automatically chooses the best settings based on what you're drying, to take the guesswork out of cycle selection, and Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
AI Optimal Dry: Our AI Optimal Dry cycle automatically chooses the best time and temperature settings based on what you're drying,¹ taking guesswork out of cycle selection, 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes² and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles, and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked., 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified, so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Shallow Closet-Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
7.6 cu. ft. Ultra Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Drying Rack: The included drying rack provides a perfect place to gently dry delicate items, sweaters and footwear, 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier, 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on AI-created algorithm. ²Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly).,

Description:
Transform clothes into a wearable state with this LG gas dryer. A convenient EasyLoad door offers dual opening options to minimize bending, and the 7.3. cu. ft. capacity handles extra large loads. Monitor the progress of drying clothes via a smartphone app thanks to the built-in Wi-Fi on this LG gas dryer. 
7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
EasyLoad Door: The dual-opening options of the LG EasyLoad door make loading and unloading the dryer easier than ever. Transferring wet clothes from the washer? Simply press the release button and pull the door down, hamper style to keep that stray sock from hitting the floor., 
: Removing dry items? Swing the door to the side to clear the way for your basket below. Even tight spaces and challenging laundry-room layouts are no match for versatility like this., 
ThinQ Technology with Proactive Customer Care / Smart Pairing: No matter where you are, use the ThinQ app to start the dryer, extend cycle time to avoid wrinkles and receive an alert when clothes are dry. Go hands-free—select dryer features work with Alexa and the Google Assistant., 
: Never run out of dryer sheets again—Amazon Dash Replenishment Service tracks usage and automatically delivers dryer sheets right to your door. ThinQ Care offers preventative maintenance tips and alerts and expedited repairs, for enhanced satisfaction plus improved product performance., 
: With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filters need lint buildup cleaning, improve performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy¹ than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to keep drying your clothes more efficiently without showing wear and tear., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right- to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry; select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer periodically tumbles the load up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: Shipped with a 3-prong (grounding) plug. Gas dryers are configured for natural gas hook-up, but a gas connector must be purchased separately., 
: ¹https://www.energystar.gov/products/appliances/clothes_dryers,

American Pride: We take pride in building strong, reliable appliances for your home. These dryers are proudly assembled by hard-working employees in Marion, Ohio.,

Description:
The Electrolux front load gas dryer with LuxCare Dry uses an advanced moisture sensor to prevent over or under-drying. The Instant Refresh cycle allows you to remove wrinkles and refresh clothing in just 10 minutes. 
Help prevent over or under drying with LuxCare Dry System: Save time and energy and protect items from over- or under-drying with our unique sensor that detects humidity on the surface and inside items so that all your fabrics are treated with precision and care., 
Remove wrinkles and refresh lightly soiled items in 10 minutes: Save water and energy with Instant Refresh which removes wrinkles and refreshes items from light wear in 10 minutes, without having to do a full wash., 
15-Minute Fast Dry: Quickly dry the items you need most., 
Predictive Dry more accurately predicts dry times: More accurately predict dry times so you don’t have to keep checking on your load with Predictive Dry. Within about 90 seconds of starting the load, the dryer calculates a more accurate time in which your clothes will be perfectly dried., 
Eco-friendly normal cycle: Our dryers are designed with the environment in mind; our normal cycle is eco - with the option of adding dry boost if you need it., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Electrolux dryers meet strict criteria to guarantee high-quality, energy-efficient performance., 
Perfect Steam option: Gently release wrinkles and reduce static to keep clothes looking their best., 
Extended Tumble option keeps clothes tangle-free: Gently tumbles your clothes without heat to keep them tangle-free--perfect for when you cannot remove clothes right after the cycle ends., 
LuxCare Lint Shield helps avoid messes: Traps lint so it doesn’t make a mess, even if you empty it while there are clothes in the dryer., 
Air Dry cycle: Confidently dry even your most delicate items with our Air Dry cycle which uses very low heat to protect clothing., 
Extra Large Capacity: Dry more in each load with our 8.0 Cu. Ft. dryers., 
Fits more rooms with reversible door: Enjoy easy loading no matter how your washer and dryer are configured., 
Optional pedestals and stacking kit for more installation options: Raise your units with optional pedestal drawers that provide extra storage. Or use the optional stacking kit for convenient placement in small spaces., 
Luxury-Design Lighting: Conveniently find any article of clothing with premium LED lighting that provides visibility inside your dryer., 
Brilliant LED display shines in even the darkest laundry rooms: Our beautifully bright display illuminates information on cycles and lets you know how much time is left., 
Luxury-Quiet Sound System: So quiet you can run it whenever you want without disrupting your household., 
Control Lock: To help avoid unwanted use.,

Description:
Compared to conventional vented dryers, this LG HeatPump dryer uses up to 65% less energy to dry every load.¹ How? By smartly recycling the pre-warmed air rather than venting it outside. But savings are only one reason to start drying differently. Ventless design can be installed almost anywhere, with a modern look that elevates any room. Even caring for favorite clothes takes a new turn—our exclusive Direct Drive Motor delivers precise tumbling motions that are perfect for delicates. 
7.8 cu. ft. Mega Capacity: Say never again to never-ending piles of laundry—this mega capacity dryer is among the largest front load ventless heat pump unit in its class² and can easily handle the laundry needs of a family of five. How big is 7.8 cu. ft.? Big enough to fit a king-size comforter and more in a single load for big time savings every week., 
Sleek Ventless Design: Space-saving ventless design means it can be installed virtually anywhere. No detail was overlooked in this dryer's sleek, modern style. The flat front design with a choice of black steel, graphite steel or white finish and tinted, tempered glass door brings a premium point of view to your laundry space., 
LCD Digital Dial Control: Customize your dry—or let AI Dry do it for you. Laundry day is just that easy with LG’s built-in intelligence and intuitive LCD dial. Streamlined controls give you more of what you need with each turn of the dial, from descriptions of each setting and helpful prompts to status updates and remaining cycle time. Easily access more than 20 cycles and quickly modify any cycle using the touch panel for total laundry control., 
Dual Inverter Heat Pump Technology: Meet a more modern approach to drying. LG's DUAL Inverter Heat Pump technology uses up to 65% less energy to dry every load.³ Not only does this ENERGY STAR certified dryer feature LG’s most energy efficient ventless drying system, the low temperatures are easier on clothes and can help them look their best for longer. And with no need for venting, this dryer is easy to install and is virtually maintenance free., 
Inverter Direct Drive Motor System: When it comes to powerful, reliable performance, there’s just no comparison. Featuring LG Exclusive Direct Drive Dryer, this ventless dryer provides even drying performance and precise tumbling motions that are extra kind to delicates. You’ll enjoy quiet operation and greater energy efficiency than belt-driven motors—no belts, no pulleys, no worries. What else can you count on? The peace of mind of a 10-year limited warranty., 
Built-In Intelligence: AI Sensor Dry with Infrared Sensor: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. A combination of AI Sensor Dry plus an additional IR sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes., 
: All to ensure this ventless dryer delivers the LG drying performance you expect—no more damp clothes, no more over-drying., 
ThinQ Smart Technology: The ThinQ app offers control and convenience to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Control your dryer remotely or use voice commands with Google or Alexa voice assistants. Plus, download additional cycles and access Smart Diagnosis, customer support, and more.⁴, 
ThinQ UP: ThinQ UP enabled smart appliances receive continual software updates for new downloadable features and enhancements sent wirelessly to the appliance. Choose which features you want and customize your appliance based on your lifestyle and personal preferences., 
ThinQ Care: Available within the ThinQ app, ThinQ Care sends proactive usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to your smartphone to help keep your LG smart appliances running smoothly., 
Auto Cleaning Condenser: Unlike some dryers that require manual cleaning of the condenser for optimal performance, LG’s Auto Cleaning Condenser does the work for you. Using water extracted during the drying cycle, it powerfully flushes away lint and debris every time you dry for better airflow, better drying and enhanced energy efficiency—automatically., 
Closet Depth: LG closet-depth washers and dryers are worth showing off, but when space dictates otherwise it’s good to know they’ll easily fit in a closet with plenty of room to close the closet door. Install the pair side-by-side, or get a stacking kit and install the dryer over the washer to save even more space., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub avoids the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹When compared with conventional vented dryer DLE3400, based on Intertek testing in normal cycle with Energy Saver option, 8.45 lb. load with 57.5% initial moisture content (September 2023), 
: ²Based on manufacturers' published specs of front load ventless heat pump dryer with a width of 27 inches or less (January 2024), 
: ³When compared with conventional vented dryer DLE3400, based on Intertek testing in normal cycle with Energy Saver option, 8.45 lb. load with 57.5% initial moisture content (September 2023),

Description:
Tired of toggling through endless cycles only to have clothes come out damp or overdry? This dryer takes out the guesswork, with built-in intelligence that uses advanced sensors and AI technology to automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more. It can even talk to your washer to select a compatible cycle—so you don’t have to. What could be easier? Use the ThinQ app to start or stop the dryer from anywhere, and even receive an alert when clothes are dry. Durable and stylish tempered glass door with white or silver accents adds the perfect finish. 
7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
Built-In Intelligence: Built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. Sensor Dry detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes, 
ThinQ Technology: No matter where you are, use the ThinQ app to start the dryer, extend cycle time to avoid wrinkles and receive an alert when clothes are dry. Go hands-free—select dryer features work with Alexa and the Google Assistant., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
Tempered Glass Door: LG front load washers and dryers use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. The premium feel is further enhanced by matching door trim and control knob accents., 
FlowSense: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators let you know when your ducts and filter need cleaning to avoid lint buildup, improve the dryer’s performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
Closet Depth: LG closet-depth washers and dryers are worth showing off, but when space dictates otherwise it’s good to know they’ll easily fit in a closet with plenty of room to close the closet door. Install the pair side-by-side, or get a stacking kit and install the dryer over the washer., 
Aluminized Alloy Steel Drum: An advanced aluminized alloy coating is added to the steel dryer drum to enhance durability and maintain its luster and attractive finish. Helps keep nicks and chips at bay so your dryer looks like new even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer.: It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home.,

Description:
8.0 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Steam and Instant Refresh features the Instant Refresh cycle which allows you to remove wrinkles and refresh clothing in just 10 minutes. The 18-Minute Fast Dry cycle allows you to quickly dry the items most needed. 
Keeps clothes looking their best without over drying: Clothes are gently tumbled while moisture sensors detect when clothes are dry to prevent over-drying., 
Instant Refresh cycle revives fabrics without washing: Save water and energy with Instant Refresh which removes wrinkles and refreshes items from light wear in 10 minutes, without having to do a full wash., 
18-Minute Fast Dry: Quickly dry the items you need most., 
Eco-friendly normal cycle: The dryers are designed with the environment in mind; the normal cycle is eco - with the option of adding dry boost if you need it., 
Perfect Steam option: Gently release wrinkles and reduce static to keep clothes looking their best., 
Extended Tumble option keeps clothes tangle-free: Gently tumbles your clothes without heat to keep them tangle-free--perfect for when you cannot remove clothes right after the cycle ends., 
LuxCare Lint Shield helps avoid messes: Traps lint so it doesn’t make a mess, even if you empty it while there are clothes in the dryer., 
Extra large capacity: Dry more in each load with our 8.0 Cu. Ft. dryers., 
Fits more rooms with reversible door: Enjoy easy loading no matter how your washer and dryer are configured., 
Optional pedestals and stacking kit for more installation options: Raise your units with optional pedestal drawers that provide extra storage. Or use the optional stacking kit for convenient placement in small spaces., 
Luxury-Design lighting: Conveniently find any article of clothing with premium LED lighting that provides visibility inside your dryer., 
Luxury-Quiet sound system: So quiet you can run it whenever you want without disrupting your household., 
Control lock: To help avoid unwanted use., 
Platinum Star limited warranty: Exclusive warranty offers peace of mind for registered owners with two years of coverage on replacement parts.,

Description:

It is also Wi-Fi Connected, so you can get end of cycle alerts, remotely start, schedule and more from your smartphone with the SmartThings App. 
Heat Pump Technology: Heat Pump Technology offers a more energy-efficient, cost-effective and gentle way to dry your clothes. Plus, its ventless design allows for simple installation in a variety of places., 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified,¹ so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.³, 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Large 4.0 cu. ft. Capacity: Conveniently designed to fit your space without sacrificing capacity., 
Closet-Depth Fit: With its compact profile, this dryer is designed for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity.⁴, 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day.,

Description:
This sleek dryer offers big style and big capacity in a small 24” wide footprint, with a go-anywhere ventless design that can be installed side by side or stacked on top of a compact LG washer. But saving space is just the beginning—LG’s innovative HeatPump technology saves energy with the dryer usage on every load. Unlike conventional condenser ventless dryers that extract the moisture from clothes and pumps it out of the dryer, this dryer extracts the moisture and recycles it for more energy-efficient drying, every day. 
4.2 cu. ft. Compact Capacity: This dryer handles surprisingly big loads for its size while expanding your installation options at the same time. The ventless design means you can put it anywhere, without worrying about long ducting runs, access to exterior walls or maintenance., 
Dual Inverter HeatPump Technology: Meet a more modern approach to drying. LG HeatPump technology extracts moisture from clothes and recycles the warm, humid air., 
Auto Cleaning Condenser: Using water extracted during the drying cycle, it powerfully flushes away lint and debris every time you dry for better airflow, better drying and enhanced energy efficiency—automatically., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology with Smart Pairing: Use the ThinQ app to start the laundry while you’re out shopping, check remaining cycle time or get notifications on your smartphone. Go hands-free—select features work with Alexa and the Google Assistant., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
Tempered Glass Doors with Chrome Trim: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rims and matching control knobs complement the doors and enhance the premium feel., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub avoids the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer/dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door (Dryer): When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay.,

Spanish Control Panel: Dryer controls in Spanish, matching washer (ETW485ASWWB) sold separately., 
Auto Dry: Auto Dry monitors the internal air temperature to determine the ideal drying time, protecting your garments from overdying., 
Powerful Venting & Flexible Installation: Powerful airflow offers long-lasting performance from lint build-up and offers venting solutions up to 120 feet for greater installation flexibility., 
Extended Tumble: Tumble clothes without heat to prevent creasing and wrinkling with a convenient extended tumble button. This cycle is ideal to help to remove even more pet hair on already-dry items, allowing debris to be caught by your dryer’s lint screen., 
Interior Light: Convenient dryer drum lights provide better visibility to help ensure no small items or socks are left behind, making it easier to load and unload laundry., 
Adjustable Cycle Signal: End of Cycle signal volume is adjustable, ensuring you are alerted to promptly remove your garments before winkles have a chance to form., 
Large Diffuser for Even Drying: A large internal heat diffuser allows for warm air to evenly spread throughout your clothes during the cycle, making this the ideal dryer for large loads and bulky items., 
Durable Aluminized Drum: This durable, long-lasting design resists corrosion and optimizes drying performance., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Door can swing from either direction making it easier to access the last sock from the back of the drum., 
Temperature Selection: Offer a range of drying temperatures to adjust to the specific needs of your garments for personalized garment care., 
Up Front Lint Filter: Simplify the task of lint removal with our convenient upfront lint filter, enhancing airflow within the appliance and for your garments., 
Delicates Cycle: This delicate, low heat dryer setting helps protect fabrics and extends the lifetime of even your most delicate items., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,

Description:
Care for clothing quickly with this GE 7.8 cu. ft. front-load electric dryer. Built-in Wi-Fi: Start, stop, and monitor your laundry from anywhere while receiving real-time notifications and updates., 
Quick dry option: Quickly dries items and small loads for families on the go.,

Description:
This LG dryer is designed to put time back on your side. When there’s no time to wash, quick and easy TurboSteam technology refreshes clothes and eases wrinkles in just 10 minutes. Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles. Built-in intelligence detects fabric texture and automatically selects the perfect settings, taking out the guesswork. Activate Smart Pairing in the ThinQ app, and the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack. Plus, with ThinQ Care, you can start and stop the dryer when you’re on the go and get preventative maintenance tips and alerts to keep your dryer running at its best. 
Sleek, Modern Style: Award-winning¹ design brings a premium look to your laundry space, with a flat front design, black steel finish, tinted, tempered glass doors and streamlined controls., 
Digital Dial Control with LCD Display: Our intuitive dial control gives you helpful information with each turn of the dial plus instant access to timesaving features like Smart Learner and Smart Pairing.², 
7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam and SteamFresh Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles in up to 5 garments³ when you don’t have time to wash and SteamFresh cycle reduces odors⁴ and refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology: The LG ThinQ app helps you manage your LG Smart appliance and more, all to make your everyday a little easier. Automatically reorder supplies based on actual usage. Start or stop programs on your way home from work⁵., 
: Even get proactive alerts with ThinQ Care to keep your appliance running smoothly—and your home running smarter. Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant and available for iOS and Android platforms, this free app will help you run your home like a pro., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance.⁶, 
Closet Depth: More Style, Less Space. LG closet-depth⁷ washers and dryers have a shallower depth to fit in more places & add sleek style to any room., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit a “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Tempered Glass Door with Chrome Rim: LG front load washers and dryers use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome door rim and matching digital control knob complement the door and enhance the premium feel., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to last., 
LG Pedestal Storage Drawer Compatible: 27" Pedestal Storage Drawers, sold separately, make loading and unloading a breeze while helping minimize laundry room clutter with a basket to help you stay organized., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹LG Washer and Dryer winner of the Red Dot Award 2022 best of the best! https://www.red-dot.org/project/lg-washer-and-dryer-55481,

: ⁴Based on independent testing on comparable model DLGX3701W on the deodorization efficacy of the SteamFresh cycle. (Rev. September 2022)., 
: ⁵Appliance must be set to remote enable. Wi-Fi and ThinQ app required., 
: ⁶https://www.energystar.gov/products/appliances/clothes_dryers, 
: ⁷Under 33.5" or 33 1/2" depth.,
