Description:
At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home. 
Built-in WiFi: Start, stop and monitor your laundry from anywhere while receiving real-time notifications and updates, 
Quick Dry: Quickly dries items and small loads for families on the go,

Description:
Let Maytag tackle your largest loads in this 7.0 cu. ft. capacity dryer. This Extra Power electric dryer boosts drying power to get thick fabrics drier the first time while Moisture Sensing prevents over- and under-drying on every load. Don’t worry about forgetting to take laundry out—Wrinkle Prevent on the dryer keeps clothes tumbling to help block wrinkles. 
Extra Power Button: The Extra Power button boosts drying power on any cycle by extending time, heat and tumbling*. One push helps prevent underdrying by getting thick fabrics, pockets and seams drier the first time., 
Steam-Enhanced Dryer: Steam-enhanced dryers harness the power of steam to help prevent wrinkles and refresh clothes—even on deserted loads., 
Wrinkle Prevent Option: Don’t worry about forgetting to take laundry out of the dryer. The Wrinkle Prevent option tumbles clothes for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends to help prevent wrinkles from forming., 
Quick Dry Cycle: Dry a small load fast with the Quick Dry cycle, which pairs nicely with the Quick Wash cycle on select Maytag washers to get clothes ready in no time., 
End of Cycle Signal: Avoid forgotten laundry with the end of cycle signal so finished loads aren't left behind.,

Description:
Samsung’s dryers have advanced features like Sensor Dry, which optimizes cycle time and temperature to thoroughly dry without damaging your clothes. Also, with 7.5 cu. ft. capacity and 10 preset drying cycles, you can do fewer loads in less time and fulfill almost every drying need. 
Flexible opening: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Filter Check Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance., 
Accessibility (ADA Compliant***, AUI, Braille): Designed for easy use for everyone., 
9 Additional Drying Options: Nine convenient drying options provide optimal care for all fabric types to keep clothes looking their best., 
5 Temperature Levels: Choose from High, Medium High, Medium, Medium Low, and Low temperature levels to dry your clothes gently and thoroughly.,

Description:
Samsung's new Smart Dial Dryer with FlexDry lets you dry delicates and everyday clothing at the same time or independently with two dryers in the same unit. It uses AI power to learn and recommend your favorite drying cycles and displays them first for quick access in a simplified, easy to use control panel. Also, with Super Speed Dry, you can dry a full load of laundry in just 30 minutes. 
FlexDry: Combining a conventional large capacity dryer with a delicate dryer in one unit allows you to dry everyday clothes and delicates at the same time or independently, keeping all your clothing in great condition., 
Delicate Dryer: With a unique drying rack and optimized air temperature, you can safely dry delicate undergarments, sweaters, and accessories to prevent shrinkage and fabric damage., 
AI Powered Smart Dial: Samsung’s simple to use, AI Powered Smart Dial learns and recommends your favorite drying cycles, automatically sets the right dry cycle based on your wash cycle selection, and allows you to customize your cycle list and change the displayed language., 
Super Speed Dry: Optimally dry a full load of laundry in just 30 minutes¹ and with an added Super Speed Washer, achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour.*, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.³, 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified, ⁴so you can save money by using less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Vent Sensor: Vent Sensor continually monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to ensure it is operating safely and efficiently., 
: It automatically notifies you when it is time for a cleaning and prompts you to check for obstructions, so you can always maintain optimum drying performance., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep the shine on your dryer with a stainless steel surface that prevents nicks and scratches from damaging the interior., 
Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance., 
Perfect Pair: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day, while looking great in your laundry room., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching dryer, riser, and more.,

Description:
Remove pet hair in the dryer with the Maytag Pet Pro top load electric dryer. The Pet Pro option lifts pet hair off clothes while the XL lint trap removes loads of pet hair. This steam dryer helps prevent wrinkles while Moisture Sensing helps prevent over- and under-drying on every load on this clothes dryer for pet hair. 
Pet Pro Option: The Pet Pro option uses a no-heat, extended dry time to lift pet hair from clothes and capture it in the XL lint trap., 
XL Lint Trap: This XL lint trap is built to trap and remove loads of pet hair., 
Steam-Enhanced Dryer: Steam-enhanced dryers harness the power of steam to help prevent wrinkles and refresh clothes—even on deserted loads., 
Wrinkle Prevent Option: Don’t worry about forgetting to take laundry out of the dryer. The Wrinkle Prevent option tumbles clothes for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends to help prevent wrinkles from forming., 
Moisture Sensing: Two sensors closely monitor inside moisture and air temperatures to deliver the right results without the decision making. When loads are evenly dry and air reaches ideal temperatures, the cycle stops, helping prevent over- and under-drying., 
Wrinkle Control Cycle: The Wrinkle Control cycle uses lower temperatures and defaults to using the Wrinkle Prevent option to help minimize wrinkles., 
Quick Dry Cycle: The Quick Dry cycle dries small loads fast. Clothes will be ready before you know it when paired with the Quick Wash cycle., 
7.0 cu. ft. capacity: Dry large loads with a spacious 7.0 cu. ft. capacity., 
End of Cycle Signal: Avoid forgotten laundry with the end of cycle signal so finished loads aren't left behind., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Built to reduce wrinkles, the Steam Refresh cycle quickly revives clothes without the need for a full wash cycle.,

Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Ultra Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes, and our AI Smart Dial, which learns and recommends your favorite cycles and makes controlling your dryer a breeze. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes¹ and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked³, 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified, so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality, 
Shallow Closet-Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App, 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
7.6 cu. ft. Ultra Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love, 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Drying Rack: The included drying rack provides a perfect place to gently dry delicate items, sweaters and footwear., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day, 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly. ²AI Smart Dial makes recommendations within 30 days of use basedon cycle selections, time selected, and other factors,

Description:
The Electrolux front load electric dryer with Balanced Dry technology prevents temperature spikes to keep fabrics cooler throughout the dry cycle. LuxCare Dry uses an advanced moisture sensor to prevent over or under-drying. 
Keep garments cooler by eliminating temp spikes with Balanced Dry: Keep clothes looking their best with Balanced Dry which eliminates temperature spikes and keeps your garments cooler without adding additional dry time., 
Help prevent over or under drying with LuxCare Dry System: Save time and energy and protect items from over- or under-drying with our unique sensor that detects humidity on the surface and inside items so that all your fabrics are treated with precision and care., 
Remove wrinkles and refresh lightly soiled items in 10 minutes: Save water and energy with Instant Refresh which removes wrinkles and refreshes items from light wear in 10 minutes, without having to do a full wash., 
15-Minute Fast Dry: Quickly dry the items you need most., 
Predictive Dry more accurately predicts dry times: More accurately predict dry times so you don’t have to keep checking on your load with Predictive Dry. Within about 90 seconds of starting the load, the dryer calculates a more accurate time in which your clothes will be perfectly dried., 
Eco-friendly normal cycle: Our dryers are designed with the environment in mind; our normal cycle is eco - with the option of adding dry boost if you need it., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Electrolux dryers meet strict criteria to guarantee high-quality, energy-efficient performance., 
Perfect Steam option: Gently release wrinkles and reduce static to keep clothes looking their best., 
Extended Tumble option keeps clothes tangle-free: Gently tumbles your clothes without heat to keep them tangle-free--perfect for when you cannot remove clothes right after the cycle ends., 
LuxCare® Lint Shield helps avoid messes: Traps lint so it doesn’t make a mess, even if you empty it while there are clothes in the dryer.,

Description:
Samsung's Large Capacity Electric Dryer is equipped with Steam Sanitize+, which removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi- Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles. With Wi-Fi connectivity, you can remotely start, stop, or delay your dryer from our simple-to-use SmartThings App. Sensor Dry automatically optimizes the time and temperature of the drying cycle to help prevent overdrying while avoiding excess energy use. 
Pet Care Dry: Keep your laundry smelling fresh, even with pets around. The Pet Care Dry Cycle helps remove 97% of 3 unpleasant odors¹ caused by animal food, messes and body odor., 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen² from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles.,

Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.⁴ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now feature audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons.,

Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day.,

Description:
Stay in control and connected from anywhere with a smart front load dryer and the Whirlpool app.* It includes a dryer rack that attaches inside the stainless steel drum for tumble-free drying of bulky or delicate items. When drying ends, the ENERGY STAR certified electric dryer' Plus option with Steam helps release and prevent wrinkles. 
Wrinkle Shield Plus Option with Steam: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics. The Wrinkle Shield Plus option with Steam uses tumbling and steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the dryer door for improved wrinkle-fighting performance., 
Smart Appliance: Care for your family from your smartphone or tablet. (Appliance must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Features subject to change. Details and privacy info at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Remote Control with the Whirlpool App: Stay connected from anywhere. The Whirlpool app lets you set, start or pause the cycle. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.)(Available on select cycles. Compatible washer required.), 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags., 
Match Washer Cycle with Dryer Cycle: Get the right kind of dry for your load. The Whirlpool app will suggest the dry cycle that matches the wash cycle. (Available on select cycles. Compatible washer required. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Touchscreen: Get instant access to the settings you use most with an intuitive touchscreen that learns, adapts and suggests customized presets based on your family's routines. Create and save up to 30 of your own favorite cycles for even more customized care., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Release wrinkles and reduce odors with the Steam Refresh cycle. It uses water and heat to get clothes ready to wear without rewashing., 
Sanitize Cycle: The Sanitize cycle provides care for your clothes in the dryer while eliminating 99.9% of common household bacteria. (Bacteria tested were K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus.), 
Static Reduce Option: Help decrease static with the Static Reduce option, which combines a spray of mist with tumbling after the load is dry., 
EcoBoost Option: Use less energy while getting great drying performance with the EcoBoost option. This option saves energy by using less heat and an extended cycle time. (Savings may vary by load type.), 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Stainless Steel Dryer Drum: Clothes are gently cradled as they tumble around the smooth surface of this drum’s stainless steel construction., 
Dryer rack: Place unique or delicate items like sweaters, pillows, hats and tennis shoes on the Dryer Rack for tumble-free drying. This rack attaches inside the drum and stays in one place throughout the cycle. Rack ships separately after online product registration., 
Closet-Depth Fit: Get a space-saving design with closet-depth fit that allows for more flexible installation in your laundry space. (Designed to fit a 33" installation depth.), 
Assign a Task: Manage laundry day from anywhere by assigning family members the next laundry step from the Whirlpool app. Send messages for transferring a load to the dryer or folding clean clothes. (WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Scan-to-Connect Technology: You don't need to be a tech expert to connect your new appliance. Simply open the Whirlpool app, add your appliance and follow the guided experience. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Voice Control with a Compatible Voice-Enabled Device (U.S. only.): Keep up with laundry with simple voice commands using a compatible voice-enabled device. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Personalized Quick Tips: The Whirlpool app delivers quick tips to make sure your family’s laundry gets the care it deserves while helping laundry day go more smoothly. (WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Favorite Cycles: Save your favorite cycles and access Favorite Cycles from the Whirlpool app to send laundry cycles to your dryer and start the load remotely. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Enhanced Troubleshooting: Get immediate support for quick solutions by using your smartphone or tablet to access troubleshooting videos within the Whirlpool app. (WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Control Lock Mode: Use your smartphone or tablet to remotely disable the control panel to avoid unintended use. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Smart Grid Compatible: Helps you reduce household energy costs. Use Smart Delay in the Whirlpool app to avoid running during peak hours. (Not available in all locations. Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.),

Description:
No one said laundry day was easy - but LG dryer innovations might just change your mind. It starts with the flexible LG EasyLoad door that opens two ways for easy loading and unloading. LG Sensor Dry system measures the amount of moisture levels throughout the cycle and automatically adjusts the drying time. All the more reason to take advantage of the 7.3 cu. ft. extra large capacity that handles really large loads. You’ll save time and energy. 
7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when your ducts and filter need lint buildup cleaning, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
Aluminized Alloy Steel Drum: An advanced aluminized alloy coating is added to the steel dryer drum to enhance durability and maintain its luster and attractive finish. Helps keep nicks and chips at bay so your dryer looks like new even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
SmartDiagnosis: If you ever experience an issue with your LG washer or dryer, you don't have to worry. The SmartDiagnosis feature helps the service center diagnose problems over the phone, or with a simple app on your smart phone, helping you minimize costly, inconvenient service calls.¹, 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: Shipped with a 3-prong (grounding) plug. Gas dryers are configured for natural gas hook-up, but a gas connector must be purchased separately., 
: ¹SmartDiagnosis is designed to supplement existing methods of problem identification and may not be able to troubleshoot all issues.,

Description:
Samsung’s new Smart Dryer has integrated Wi-Fi that allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, and receive end of cycle alerts and more, right from your smartphone. Also, the Steam Sanitize+ cycle eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria while relaxing and smoothing away wrinkles from everyday wear. 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified,³ so you can save money by using less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Vent Sensor: Vent Sensor continually monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to ensure it is operating safely and efficiently. It automatically notifies you when it is time for a cleaning and prompts you to check for obstructions, so you can always maintain optimum drying performance., 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.⁴ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions., 
Drying Rack: Included Drying Rack lets you delicately dry undergarments, sweaters, and accessories., 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now feature audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons., 
Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love.,

Description:
Elegant yet simple, LG SIGNATURE has been carefully crafted by leading experts to provide an experience that is intuitive, responsive and functional. Touch controls built right onto the door, Pinterest-worthy good looks. This LG dryer is so stylish, you may start making excuses to spend more time in the laundry room. This LG dryer scores high on all fronts, with standout details like touch controls built onto the door, contoured styling and an elevated, angled drum for easy loading and unloading. Then, there’s TurboSteam technology that vanquishes wrinkles, hanger bumps and odors in 10 minutes flat¹. Laundry never looked so good. 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
9.0 cu. ft. Mega Capacity: When it comes to laundry capacity, big is good, bigger is better, but biggest is best. With 9.0 cu. ft. of mega capacity, now you can fit a king size comforter and full set of bedding in a single load! You'll definitely have more room to dry., 
Full Touch On-Door Control Panel: Seamlessly, completely integrated into the door, adding to the distinctive look of your LG washer. But there's no need to treat these touch controls with kid gloves — with shock-resistant urethane coating and rigorous stress testing, this is one tough motherboard., 
TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes,¹ TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
Ergonomic Angled Door: The contoured front earns high marks for style but is actually the result of careful engineering to make laundry day less of a workout. The drum is elevated and angled by an extra 10 degree tilt. Additionally the door opening is angled to match for easier access., 
: Overall, this may not sound like a big difference, but each time you reach for that last sock and move loads from the washer to the dryer to your basket you will be happy LG took the extra step., 
ThinQ Technology: The LG ThinQ app helps you manage your LG Smart appliance and more, all to make your everyday a little easier. Automatically reorder supplies based on actual usage. Start or stop programs on your way home from work., 
: Even get proactive alerts with ThinQ Care to keep your appliance running smoothly—and your home running smarter. Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant and available for iOS and Android platforms, this free app will help you run your home like a pro., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to keep drying your clothes more efficiently without showing wear and tear., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer.: It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹Refresh in just 10 minutes up to 5 garments, based on test conducted at LG’s test lab facility in December, 2014.,

Description:
Match your family's routines and your space with a front load hybrid heat pump dryer that can be installed virtually anywhere, thanks to its ventless design. Dry each load your way in this ENERGY STAR certified dryer with our most efficient full-size dryer technology that recirculates hot air to help conserve energy. 
Wrinkle Shield Option: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics with the Wrinkle Shield option. It keeps clothes tumbling for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the door., 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Advanced Moisture Sensing: Help prevent overdrying. Three sensors track moisture and temperature, adapting drying times to end the cycle at just the right time., 
Eco option: Save energy by gently drying clothes at low temperatures with the Eco option, which recirculates hot air to reduce use of the heater., 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Stainless Steel Dryer Drum: Clothes are gently cradled as they tumble around the smooth surface of this drum’s stainless steel construction., 
Closet-Depth Fit: Get a space-saving design with closet-depth fit that allows for more flexible installation in your laundry space., 
Flexible installation: Designed to fit a 33" installation depth and with ventless technology, this closet-depth dryer can be installed virtually anywhere., 
Hybrid heat pump drying technology: Dry each load your way with our most efficient full-size dryer technology that recirculates hot air to help conserve energy., 
: Choose the Eco option when you want to save energy with gentle drying at lower temperatures or the Speed option when you need clothes to be ready quickly with help from the heater., 
Laundry Pedestals: Raise your dryer for easier loading and unloading. Optional laundry pedestals also provide space-saving storage for detergent, dryer sheets and other supplies.,

Description:
Clean, dry clothes are no longer a luxury for larger homes and buildings. This compact dryer is ideal for smaller spaces and apartments. This mini dryer comes with a dryer vent hose that's 4” in diameter, as well as an exhaust connector, lint and exhauster filters. Enjoy drying up to 13.2 lbs. of laundry per load with an inside stainless-steel capacity of 3.5 cu. ft. This outstanding 120V clothes dryer runs on 1500W and connects to standard outlets with its 3-proing plug. Choose your drying mode, whether Air Dry, Cool, Warm & Hot. Drying times vary between 30 – 200 minutes. The drying times will be extended over traditional full-size dryers due to the fact that this unit uses 120V versus a 220V full size machine. Fill halfway for fluffy, freshly dried clothing. This portable dryer with overheat protection and Sensor Dry, enabling the dryer to measure moisture level and dry accordingly. Included are adjustable leveling legs, front loading transparent lid and compatibility with a variety of other washers. 
Sensor dry function: Measures moisture and automatically adjusts the heat for more efficient drying performance., 
ECO mode: Saves energy by beginning the drying cycle with cool air and changing to hot air setting., 
Compact and powerful: This Dryer dimensions of 23.6” x 21.5” x 27.5” weight of 49.5 lbs. It can be installed in smaller rooms, spaces, and apartments., 
Compatible with most washers: Most compatible with washers BPWH84W, BPWM09W, BPWM16W, BPWM20W, BPWM30W and BFLW27MW., 
Disclaimer: Exhaust hose that is sold separately and is not included.,

Description:
The Electrolux front load electric dryer with LuxCare Dry uses an advanced moisture sensor to prevent over or under-drying. The Instant Refresh cycle allows you to remove wrinkles and refresh clothing in just 10 minutes. 
Get a more precise dry with our LuxCare Dry System: Save time and energy and protect items from over or under-drying with our unique sensor that detects humidity on the surface and inside items so that all your fabrics are treated with precision and care., 
Instant Refresh cycle revives fabrics without washing: Save water and energy with Instant Refresh which removes wrinkles and refreshes items from light wear in 10 minutes, without having to do a full wash., 
15-Minute Fast Dry: Quickly dry the items you need most., 
Predictive Dry more accurately predicts dry times: More accurately predict dry times so you don’t have to keep checking on your load with Predictive Dry. Within about 90 seconds of starting the load, the dryer calculates a more accurate time in which your clothes will be perfectly dried., 
Eco-friendly normal cycle: Our dryers are designed with the environment in mind; our normal cycle is eco - with the option of adding dry boost if you need it., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Our dryers are designed with the environment in mind; our normal cycle is eco - with the option of adding dry boost if you need it., 
Perfect Steam option: Gently release wrinkles and reduce static to keep clothes looking their best., 
Extended Tumble option keeps clothes tangle-free: Gently tumbles your clothes without heat to keep them tangle-free--perfect for when you cannot remove clothes right after the cycle ends., 
LuxCare Lint Shield helps avoid messes: Traps lint so it doesn’t make a mess, even if you empty it while there are clothes in the dryer., 
Activewear Cycle: Takes care of delicate and expensive activewear garments., 
Extra Large Capacity: Dry more in each load with our 8.0 Cu. Ft. dryers., 
Fits more rooms with reversible door: Enjoy easy loading no matter how your washer and dryer are configured., 
Optional pedestals and stacking kit for more installation options: Raise your units with optional pedestal drawers that provide extra storage. Or use the optional stacking kit for convenient placement in small spaces., 
Luxury-Design Lighting: Conveniently find any article of clothing with premium LED lighting that provides visibility inside your dryer., 
Brilliant LED display shines in even the darkest laundry rooms: Our beautifully bright display illuminates information on cycles and lets you know how much time is left., 
Luxury-Quiet Sound System: So quiet you can run it whenever you want without disrupting your household., 
Control Lock: To help avoid unwanted use.,

Description:

Wrinkle Shield Plus Option with Steam: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics. The Wrinkle Shield Plus option with Steam uses tumbling and steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the dryer door for improved wrinkle-fighting performance., 
Smart Appliance: Care for your family from your smartphone or tablet. (Appliance must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Features subject to change. Details and privacy info at whirlpool.com/connect.),

Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.)(Available on select cycles. Compatible washer required.), 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags.,

ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Touchscreen: Get instant access to the settings you use most with an intuitive touchscreen that learns, adapts and suggests customized presets based on your family's routines. Create and save up to 30 of your own favorite cycles for even more customized care., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Release wrinkles and reduce odors with the Steam Refresh cycle. It uses water and heat to get clothes ready to wear without rewashing., 
Sanitize Cycle: The Sanitize cycle provides care for your clothes in the dryer while eliminating 99.9% of common household bacteria. (Bacteria tested were K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus.), 
Static Reduce Option: Help decrease static with the Static Reduce option, which combines a spray of mist with tumbling after the load is dry., 
EcoBoost Option: Use less energy while getting great drying performance with the EcoBoost option. This option saves energy by using less heat and an extended cycle time. (Savings may vary by load type.), 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Stainless Steel Dryer Drum: Clothes are gently cradled as they tumble around the smooth surface of this drum’s stainless steel construction., 
Dryer rack: Place unique or delicate items like sweaters, pillows, hats and tennis shoes on the Dryer Rack for tumble-free drying. This rack attaches inside the drum and stays in one place throughout the cycle. Rack ships separately after online product registration.,

Description:
24 Inch Electric Heat Pump Dryer with 4.1 cu. ft. Capacity, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, Delay Start, Anti-Crease Mode, LCD Display, End Program Signal, and Humidity Sensor 
Soft Drum: Soft Drum is a solution developed to enhance air flow around the load, thereby increasing the drying effect. The circular indentations with bevelled edges also have a cushioning effect that reduces wear and tear on fabrics. The new drum design allows for even and gentle drying with both small and large loads., 
Butterfly Drying: This smart feature is our own invention. It saves both the motor and your ironing board. The unique paddles inside the drum tumble the clothes in a figure eight to prevent the clothes from bundling. This leads to a reduced need to reverse the drum rotation. This is an intelligent function which saves the motor and the belt from any unnecessary strain and your clothes from creasing., 
Multi Filter System: The Multi Filter System effectively traps all lint before reaching more sensitive parts of the tumble dryer. This keeps the drying times shorter and the machine up and running., 
Sensi dry: The ASKO Sensi Dry system measures moisture in and around the machine, which prevents unnecessary over-drying as well as wear and tear on your clothes., 
Stainless Steel Drum: At ASKO, we believe not only that stainless steel will outlast for example, plastic, but also that quality materials will always look better in years to come. Eventually, galvanised steel rusts, so we decided to make our drums out of stainless steel. That’s why our tumble dryers really do last longer.,

Description:
Samsung's Large Capacity Electric Dryer is equipped with our AI Smart Dial, which learns and recommends your favorite cycles and simplifies the control panel, to make controlling your dryer a breeze. It also has our Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes, and MultiControl, which lets you control your dryer right from the washer when the units are stacked. 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes¹ and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer., 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze., 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked.³, 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen⁴ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles., 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified,⁵ so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Shallow Closet Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation,⁶ without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App, 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love, 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly)., 
: ²AI Smart Dial makes recommendations within 30 days of use based on cycle selections, time selected, and other factors., 
: ³Use of this feature requires a stacked AI Smart Dial washer and dryer and Stacking & MultiControl Kit (SKK-8MC), which is sold separately., 
: ⁴Testing based on Samsung internal protocols. Results provided to and interpreted by Intertek. Individual results may vary., 
: ⁵Visit www.energystar.gov for more information on ENERGY STAR® guidelines., 
: ⁶Designed to fit a 38" installation depth.,

Commercial-grade dryer technology ensures it's built to last, while optional smart electric dryer features such as remote start and cycle notifications help you stay in control and efficiently manage laundry from anywhere. 
Extra Power: Extra Power boosts drying power to get thick fabrics drier the first time.¹, 
Wrinkle Prevent Option with Steam: With the Wrinkle Prevent option with Steam, the dryer tumbles your clothes with steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle has ended to keep wrinkles at bay., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Reduce Static Option: The Reduce Static option cuts down on cling with the addition of a fine mist of water as clothes tumble at the end of the cycle., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Built to reduce wrinkles, the Steam Refresh cycle quickly revives clothes without the need for a full wash cycle., 
Hamper Door: Sweep laundry onto the open hamper door to keep it off the floor. The latch-free door drops down, giving you a chute for loading and a sturdy platform for unloading, folding and stacking., 
Cycle Notifications: Finished loads won't be left behind with the Maytag app.² Get end of cycle notification on your smartphone with the option to Assign a Task to family members to keep laundry moving., 
10-year Limited Parts Warranty: We don’t just tell you a Maytag dryer will get your clothes dry for years: we confidently back our dryers with a 10-year limited parts warranty* on the drive motor and drum., 
Quick Dry Cycle: The Quick Dry cycle dries small loads fast. Clothes will be ready before you know it when paired with the Quick Wash cycle., 
Remote Start: Do laundry anywhere, anytime with your smartphone.² Set cycles with the option to choose from customized favorites, only available in the Maytag app, then start and stop the cycle remotely., 
Troubleshoot: Troubleshoot select issues without a service call. The Maytag app sends notifications of appliance error codes to help you diagnose the error and videos of select issues walk you through steps to solve the problem.², 
Assign a Task: Manage laundry from anywhere by assigning tasks to family members like transferring a load to the dryer or folding clean clothes through customized text messages. ², 
Match Washer and Dryer Cycle: Get the best dry for your clothes without the guesswork. With the Maytag app, receive a recommended dry cycle that matches your last wash cycle, then send the cycle to your dryer.², 
Smart Tips: Personalized Smart Tips based on your laundry activity help you best clean your laundry and effectively use your Maytag appliances.², 
Favorites: Create customized cycles and save them in the Maytag app. Instantly access Favorites from the app and send them to your washer or dryer to start the load remotely. ², 
American Pride: We take pride in building strong, reliable appliances for your home. These dryers are proudly assembled by hard-working employees in Marion, Ohio., 
Heavy-duty hinges: Heavy-duty door hinges are built tough for years of reliable opening and closing., 
Wrinkle Control Cycle: The Wrinkle Control cycle uses lower temperatures and defaults to using the Wrinkle Prevent option to help minimize wrinkles., 
Maytag Commercial Technology: Maytag Commercial Technology ensures our dryers are built to last, coming standard with a durable motor and the dryer drum backed by a 10-year limited parts warranty., 
: ¹ Results may vary based on load size and type.,

Save space in your laundry room and still get your clothes dry with this 120-Volt 3.6 cu. ft. electric dryer that stacks on top of a washer or counter. Three dry cycles and 3 heat selections cater to different fabrics. 
Rotary mechanical controls: Allow simple and efficient operation., 
3.6 cu. ft. capacity: Dries your clothing in a short amount of time., 
3 dry cycles: Include cottons, quick fluff and time dry for choosing a setting that is right for your load.,

Description:
Samsung's 7.5 cu. ft. Large Capacity Front Load Electric Dryer comes integrated with Wi-Fi connectivity and SmartThings so you can receive end-of-cycle alerts and schedule laundry right from your smartphone.* It also features worry-free drying with Sensor Dry to help prevent over-drying for optimal fabric care. 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your wash, schedule cycles on your time and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹, 
Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Interior Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Reversible Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.² Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser,³ your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching washer, pedestal, riser and more., 
: ¹Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. Available on Android and iOS devices. Only monitoring enabled on Gas Dryers for safety reasons., 
: ²Requires Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App. The Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App supports Android OS 2.3.6 or later and iOS 3 or later for iPhone models. Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App available in App Store and Play Store.,

Description:
Samsung’s new 7.5 cu. ft. dryer allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, receive end of cycle alerts, and more, right from your smartphone. Steam Sanitize+ eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria, while Multi-Steam technology relaxes and smooths away wrinkles from everyday wear. 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Scratch-Resistant Tempered Glass Door: Our sleek, new flat-panel door will elevate any laundry space and with scratch-resistant tempered glass, it combines an ultra-premium design with a durable finish, 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake., 
: The Filter Check Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance.,

Description:
Samsung's Large Capacity Electric Dryer is equipped with Steam Sanitize+, which removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi- Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles. With Wi-Fi connectivity, you can remotely start, stop, or delay your dryer from our simple-to-use SmartThings App. Sensor Dry automatically optimizes the time and temperature of the drying cycle to help prevent overdrying while avoiding excess energy use. 
Pet Care Dry: Keep your laundry smelling fresh, even with pets around. The Pet Care Dry Cycle helps remove 97% of 3 unpleasant odors¹ caused by animal food, messes and body odor., 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen² from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: With Wi-Fi connectivity, remotely start, stop, or delay your dryer from one simple-to-use app. Get cycle recommendations, alerts when your drying is done, energy usage notifications and so much more.³, 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.⁴ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now feature audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons., 
Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day., 
: ¹Based on DOE 1.5kg load of wet laundry polluted with 3 gases: Isovaleraldehyde (food), Methyl Mercaptan (feces) and Nonanal (body).,

: ³Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. The Samsung SmartThings App supports Android OS 4.0 (ICS) or later which is optimized for Samsung smartphones (Galaxy S and Galaxy Note series).,

: ⁴Requires Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App. The Samsung Smart Washer/ Dryer App supports Android OS 2.3.6 or later and iOS 3 or later for iPhone models. Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App available in App Store and Play Store.,

Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Large Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes, and our AI Smart Dial, which learns and recommends your favorite cycles and makes controlling your dryer a breeze. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes¹ and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked³, 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen⁴ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR Certified,⁵ so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality, 
Shallow Closet-Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
7.5 cu. ft. Ultra Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly)., 
: ²AI Smart Dial makes recommendations within 30 days of use based on cycle selections, time selected, and other factors.,

Product Name: BESPOKE 7.5 cu. ft. Large Capacity Electric Dryer with Super Speed Dry and AI Smart Dial
Name: Samsung - BESPOKE 7.5 cu. ft. Large Capacity Electric Dryer with Super Speed Dry and AI Smart Dial - Brushed Black

Description:
24 Inch Electric Dryer with 4.1 Cu. Ft. Capacity, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, Line Concept, Multi Filter System, LCD Display, Stack Kit Included, 9 Dry Cycles, Sensi Dry, Airing, Anti-Crease, and Auto Synthetic 
Soft Drum: Soft Drum is a solution developed to enhance air flow around the load, thereby increasing the drying effect. The circular indentations with bevelled edges also have a cushioning effect that reduces wear and tear on fabrics. The new drum design allows for even and gentle drying with both small and large loads., 
Butterfly Drying: This smart feature is our own invention. It saves both the motor and your ironing board. The unique paddles inside the drum tumble the clothes in a figure eight to prevent the clothes from bundling. This leads to a reduced need to reverse the drum rotation. This is an intelligent function which saves the motor and the belt from any unnecessary strain and your clothes from creasing., 
Multi Filter System: The Multi Filter System effectively traps all lint before reaching more sensitive parts of the tumble dryer. This keeps the drying times shorter and the machine up and running., 
Sensi dry: The ASKO Sensi Dry system measures moisture in and around the machine, which prevents unnecessary over-drying as well as wear and tear on your clothes., 
Stainless Steel Drum: At ASKO, we believe not only that stainless steel will outlast for example, plastic, but also that quality materials will always look better in years to come. Eventually, galvanised steel rusts, so we decided to make our drums out of stainless steel. That’s why our tumble dryers really do last longer.,

Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Ultra Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our AI Optimal Dry, which automatically chooses the best settings based on what you're drying, to take the guesswork out of cycle selection, and Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
AI Optimal Dry: Our AI Optimal Dry cycle automatically chooses the best time and temperature settings based on what you're drying,¹ taking guesswork out of cycle selection, 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes² and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles, and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked., 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified, so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Shallow Closet-Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
7.6 cu. ft. Ultra Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Drying Rack: The included drying rack provides a perfect place to gently dry delicate items, sweaters and footwear, 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier, 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on AI-created algorithm. ²Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly).,

Description:
24 Inch Electric Dryer with 5.1 Cu. Ft. Capacity, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, Air Lift Paddles, Multi Filter System, Lint Trap, 16 Programs, Drying Sensor, Steam Wrinkle Care, Quick Pro Cycle, and ENERGY STAR Rating 
Soft Drum: Soft Drum is a solution developed to enhance air flow around the load, thereby increasing the drying effect. The circular indentations with bevelled edges also have a cushioning effect that reduces wear and tear on fabrics. The new drum design allows for even and gentle drying with both small and large loads., 
Butterfly Drying: This smart feature is our own invention. It saves both the motor and your ironing board. The unique paddles inside the drum tumble the clothes in a figure eight to prevent the clothes from bundling. This leads to a reduced need to reverse the drum rotation. This is an intelligent function which saves the motor and the belt from any unnecessary strain and your clothes from creasing., 
Multi Filter System: The Multi Filter System effectively traps all lint before reaching more sensitive parts of the tumble dryer. This keeps the drying times shorter and the machine up and running., 
Sensi dry: The ASKO Sensi Dry system measures moisture in and around the machine, which prevents unnecessary over-drying as well as wear and tear on your clothes., 
Stainless Steel Drum: At ASKO, we believe not only that stainless steel will outlast for example, plastic, but also that quality materials will always look better in years to come. Eventually, galvanised steel rusts, so we decided to make our drums out of stainless steel. That’s why our tumble dryers really do last longer.,

Description:
Samsung's new Smart Dial Dryer with FlexDry lets you dry delicates and everyday clothing at the same time or independently with two dryers in the same unit. It uses AI power to learn and recommend your favorite drying cycles and displays them first for quick access in a simplified, easy to use control panel. Also, with Super Speed Dry, you can dry a full load of laundry in just 30 minutes. 
FlexDry: Combining a conventional large capacity dryer with a delicate dryer in one unit allows you to dry everyday clothes and delicates at the same time or independently, keeping all your clothing in great condition., 
Delicate Dryer: With a unique drying rack and optimized air temperature, you can safely dry delicate undergarments, sweaters, and accessories to prevent shrinkage and fabric damage., 
AI Powered Smart Dial: Samsung’s simple to use, AI Powered Smart Dial learns and recommends your favorite drying cycles, automatically sets the right dry cycle based on your wash cycle selection, and allows you to customize your cycle list and change the displayed language., 
Super Speed Dry: Optimally dry a full load of laundry in just 30 minutes¹ and with an added Super Speed Washer, achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour.*, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.³, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR Certified, ⁴so you can save money by using less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Vent Sensor: Vent Sensor continually monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to ensure it is operating safely and efficiently., 
: It automatically notifies you when it is time for a cleaning and prompts you to check for obstructions, so you can always maintain optimum drying performance., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep the shine on your dryer with a stainless steel surface that prevents nicks and scratches from damaging the interior., 
Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance., 
Perfect Pair: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day, while looking great in your laundry room., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching dryer, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load. (50% cotton, 50% poly)., 
: ²Based on internal testing and independently verified by Intertek.,

Description:
This LG dryer is designed to put time back on your side. When there’s no time to wash, quick and easy TurboSteam technology refreshes clothes and eases wrinkles in just 10 minutes¹. Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles. Built-in intelligence detects fabric texture and automatically selects the perfect settings, taking out the guesswork. Activate Smart Pairing in the ThinQ app, and the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle², making it the ultimate laundry hack. Plus, with ThinQ Care, you can start and stop the dryer when you’re on the go—and get preventative maintenance tips and alerts to keep your dryer running at its best. 
Sleek, Modern Style: Award-winning¹ design brings a premium look to your laundry space, with a flat front design, black steel finish, tinted, tempered glass doors and streamlined controls., 
Digital Dial Control with LCD Display: Our intuitive dial control gives you helpful information with each turn of the dial plus instant access to timesaving features like Smart Learner and Smart Pairing.², 
7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam & SteamFresh Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles in up to 5 garments³ when you don’t have time to wash and SteamFresh cycle reduces odors⁴ and refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology: The LG ThinQ app helps you manage your LG Smart appliance and more, all to make your everyday a little easier. Automatically reorder supplies based on actual usage. Start or stop programs on your way home from work⁵., 
: Even get proactive alerts with ThinQ Care to keep your appliance running smoothly—and your home running smarter. Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant and available for iOS and Android platforms, this free app will help you run your home like a pro., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when your ducts and filter need lint cleaning, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and helps give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance.⁶, 
Closet Depth: More Style, Less Space. LG closet-depth⁷ washers and dryers have a shallower depth to fit in more places & add sleek style to any room., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit a “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Tempered Glass Door with Chrome Rim: LG front load washers and dryers use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome door rim and matching digital control knob complement the door and enhance the premium feel., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to last., 
LG Pedestal Storage Drawer Compatible (27"): 27" Pedestal Storage Drawers, sold separately, make loading and unloading a breeze while helping minimize laundry room clutter with a basket to help you stay organized., 
: Shipped with a 3-prong (grounding) plug. Gas dryers are configured for natural gas hook-up, but a gas connector must be purchased separately., 
: ¹LG Washer and Dryer winner of the Red Dot Award 2022 best of the best! https://www.red-dot.org/project/lg-washer-and-dryer-55481, 
: ²Both washer and dryer need to be registered in LG ThinQ app and connected to Wi-Fi to set up Smart Pairing feature., 
: ³Refresh in just 10 minutes up to 5 garments, based on TurboSteam wrinkle removal test conducted at LG’s test lab facility (October 2014)., 
: ⁴Based on independent testing on comparable model DLGX3701W on the deodorization efficacy of the SteamFresh cycle. (Rev. September 2022)., 
: ⁵Appliance must be set to remote enable. Wi-Fi and ThinQ app required., 
: ⁶https://www.energystar.gov/products/appliances/clothes_dryers, 
: ⁷Under 33.5" or 33 1/2" depth.,

Description:
Doing laundry might be an unwelcome chore, but the Insignia NS-TDRG67W1 12-Cycle Gas Dryer makes it easier than ever before. A 6.7 cu. ft. capacity makes doing large loads a breeze, saving you time and letting you move on to doing other things. 12 unique drying cycles, ranging from Delicates to Heavy Duty, get everything from clothing to comforters as clean as can be. A special Wrinkle Care mode reduces wrinkles and various dryness levels let you choose anywhere between high heat or no heat. The dryer is a front load design and features a reversible door, letting you choose whatever option works best for your layout. Plus, picking up the available matching washer means you’ll spend less time doing laundry and more time doing what you want to do. 
6.7 cu. ft. capacity: Gives you the space you need to thoroughly wash blankets, comforters, curtains, coats and more., 
9 sensor and manual drying cycles: 6 sensor cycles - Normal, Heavy Duty, Towels, Casual, Delicates and Sanitize - automatically detect moisture and adjust the dry time. 3 manual cycles - Quick Dry, Air Fluff and Time Dry (20-, 40-, 60- and 80-Minute)- let you customize the dry time., 
Front load design: Easy-access front load design makes larger loads easier to lift in and out., 
Temperature selection: Select either High, Medium, Low or No Heat for simple temperature adjustment., 
Dryness levels: Choose the dryness level (Damp, Normal, More Dry or Very Dry) that best suits your load, and the dryer automatically detects the load’s moisture and stops when your clothes are finished., 
Wrinkle Care feature: Provides about 90 minutes of intermittent tumbling in unheated air, reducing wrinkles in your clothing., 
Control panel: Select your drying mode at the simple twist of a knob. It also displays indicator lights for cycle selections you have made., 
Reversible door: Choose the direction of the door that best suits your space., 
Gas connection: Connect the dryer to a 3-prong electrical outlet and a gas line (use only natural or liquid propane gases)., 
Clean Filter indicator: Reminds you when your filter needs to be cleaned., 
Less than 69 dB: Operates at a noise level of less than 69 dB., 
Leveling feet: 4 adjustable feet keep your dryer level., 
Matching washer: The coordinating NS-TWM35W1 washer gives your laundry area a cohesive look.,
